string.value: Arwen, after much contemplation, says she can't understand Reef's actions but takes some responsibility for them. She, then, asks you for a favor... to deliver Fairy Hair to #bReef#k. She seems sincere, so perhaps you should help her out. Don't forget that Reef is a ghost who only appears #bfrom 5 p.m. to 7 a.m. of the following day#k.
You have delivered the Fairy Hair to Reef. Reef, surprised at the unexpected gift, asks you to give his apologies to #bGrendel the Really Old#k for having harmed others.
...I don't know. Why are humans so volatile? I can't understand Reef's feelings and actions... none of it. But I am feeling guilty... I must be feeling responsible for this.

Reef is definitely at fault... but I can't say that I'm completely devoid of any blame either. That's what my head is telling me, but, sometimes, it's necessary to listen to what your heart is saying too... Will you do me a favor?

I will give you this #bFairy Hair#k... will you give it to #bReef#k? No matter how hard I try, I can't understand how he could be so foolish... but it wouldn't be a bad idea to clam his anger down a bit.
How ill-natured humans are. But what can I do? Come back and see me if you want to help.
...Ah, you're here. Did you give Arwen my apologies? What? You didn't? Why not...?!
...This is... Fairy Hair! How... did you...? Giving Fairy Hair signifies a sincere apology. Did Arwen really ask you to give this to me? This means... Arwen is sorry...

I can't believe it... Arwen, so arrogant as can be, is apologizing to someone...? And, of all people, she's apologizing to Reef? In truth, she didn't do anything wrong. It's me who has to apologize... Arwen, I'm sorry and thank you.
I'm sorry. I've been a pain in the neck to you. Will you also tell Grendel the Really Old that I'm very sorry?
Haven't you gone to see #bReef#k yet? I'm sure you know where he is... don't you?

...What? You've lost the Fairy Hair? Oh my... do you know how precious that is? Ugh, humans...! Okay, Arwen... Breathe... Breathe... Alright, I will give you the Fairy Hair one more time. Don't you lose it! Make sure #bReef#k gets it this time!
